title: Eugene V. Debs: the Making of An American Radical
description: "Let the people take heart & hope everywhere, for the cross is bending, the midnight is passing, & joy cometh with the morning."--Eugene Victor Debs in 1918 This moving biography presents the definitive story of the life & legacy of the most eloquent spokesperson & leader of the US labor & socialist movements.
